sentences.en: All long tern subscription refund will be paid by check.
sentences.cn: 所有长期软体租用的退款将以支票支付.

sentences.en: Drawing style is the naturally expression of artist's inner spirit which cultivated in a tern practice.
sentences.cn: 面貌是画家在长期实践中内在精神的自然流露.

sentences.en: I took several photos of the Chinese crested tern amidst the Greater crested terns.
sentences.cn: 我拍了许多黑嘴端凤头燕鸥在一群凤头燕鸥中的照片.

sentences.en: Our tern be always cash In advance.
sentences.cn: 我们的条件总是预付现金.
tern的资产负债表保持著良好状态.

sentences.en: The tiny arctic tern makes the longest migration of any animal in the world, flying about two times farther than previously thought, a new study says.
sentences.cn: 一项新的研究表明，小小的北极燕鸥竟创下了动物世界的飞行记录，“旅途”长度是此前相关数据的二倍。

sentences.en: When they get a tern or pelican to drop a fish, they plunge down and grab it off the surface of the water, which may have been how this bird got oiled.
sentences.cn: 当军舰鸟发现一只燕鸥或者鹈鹕准备冲入水中捕鱼时就猛冲下去，在捕鱼的鸟离开海面时抓住它们，这可能就是这种鸟为何解决到石油的原因。

words.tran_cn: 三出的；三个一套的；三个的

trans.tran_en: a black and white sea bird that has long wings and a tail with two points
